RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FITTS N STARTS broke outward and a bit slowly, moved up to race in mid pack early toward the inside, closer from between horses late in the final turn, challenged inside the leader when straightened for home, took over, held off the runner up late after drifting out a bit. TAP IRON FIST also broke back, void of early foot, angled five wide when beginning to advance turning for home, late bid outside the winner, denied, clear for the place. EASY ACES raced back and outside through the first turn, advanced and challenged second turn, came four wide into the stretch to lose ground to the winner, came back for the show while not a match for the top two. DAISY DE ORO in the second flight, advanced and challenged three wide second turn, briefly clear upper stretch, faltered. MIDNIGHT FAITH in the second flight off the inside, three wide into the straight, went evenly to the wire. MISS BARETA broke on top, dueled up front through some quick early fractions, gave way far turn. SAINT MARY fell back to trail after the start and was never a menace. REMEMBERIN RONALD alternated up front through those quick early fractions in the two path and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Bareta
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, quick early, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberin Ronald
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick duel 2p, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Mary
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Creek Stud LLC and Roven John
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never menace

ENTRY.NAME: Daisy de Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, bid 2nd, led, clear upper,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3w into the stretch, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: back and outside, closer far turn, bid, 4w 1/4,came back show

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Iron Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, angled 5w into lane, rallied, late bid, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Fitts N Starts
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bit slow, mid pack, closer 1/4, inside bid, held late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BATTLE OF WITS dueled up the backstretch off the inside, continued to battle through the turn, shook off the other speed to be clear in upper stretch, maintained daylight to the finish under steady handling. MAVE RUNNER with the early pace between rivals, fell back into and through the turn, angled four wide turning into the stretch, slowly getting to the winner late while holding sway for the place. JULIO CHOICE fell back after the start, began to advance midway on the turn, came five wide and outside the runner up into the stretch, also closed the gap on the winner late while being outfinished for the place. SARATOGA KAREN off a beat slow, raced back off the pace, improved position through the lane while not a threat to the top three. ANIME DAY in the second flight out in the strip, raced three to four wide through the turn, came up empty for the drive. RESPECT ALL forwardly placed while racing outside in the run up the backstretch, gave way in the turn. ASTRO FLASH broke inward and back, was used to move up and duel into the turn, gave way in the drive. ARCTIC GUITAR fell back to trail after the start, showed little in remaining back.

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in and back, used inside, dueled, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Arctic Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Karen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slow, back, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Wits
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, shook clear into the lane, held to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Mave Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace, fell back, angled 4w into lane, slow gain late

ENTRY.NAME: Anime Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Respect All
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Julio Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, 5w into lane, outkicked for the 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAL'S DREAM settled off the pace, asked along three wide second turn, firm handling while making slow but steady progress on the leader past the furlong marker, just up at the wire. MACEE broke on top, soon cleared, set an unpressured and comfortable pace, nailed in the final strides. MYLIES STAR lacked any early foot, four to five wide late in the final turn, rallied to be along for the show, not a threat to the top two. RYAN'S GRACE moved up to chase the leader through those modest fractions for six furlongs, had little left for the stretch drive. GURKHA GOLD (IRE) in the second flight early, saved ground into the stretch, failed to respond. BOSTON LUCILLE reared at the break, trailed early as a result, remained back in failing to muster a rally. KAITLYN'S COURT finished early to also be always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Lucille
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, trailed early, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Macee
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, clear, comfortable pace, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Gurkha Gold (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Ryan's Grace
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased soft pace, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Kaitlyn's Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Hal's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off pace, asked 3w 2nd turn, firm handling, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Mylies Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4-5w rally, along show, no match top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUSTOM BLUE GRASS in mid pack toward the inside early, knifed through three wide to challenge turning for home, kicked strongly clear under steady handling. GOTTATAKEHIMTO lacked early foot outside, came four wide out of the final turn, rallied for the place down the middle of the strip, no match for the winner. HEARTTHROB HALO in the main body outside, five wide early in the turn, six wide exiting, long drive for the place, outkicked late. AND FIFTY forwardly placed out in the strip, moved a bit closer in the four path turning for home, went evenly the final furlong in lacking a closing punch. GIMMEASOUND with the pace along the inside after breaking in good order, held a narrow advantage into the stretch, offered little resistance to the winner soon after then began to weaken when headed by that one approaching the furlong marker. FLASHY PREMO void of speed, moved toward the inside turn, improved position through traffic without posing a serious threat. GENIUS with the pace three wide for a half then faltered from between rivals. LT. BONURA forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch, began to retreat before a half. GALAXY BUILDER last to leave, void of speed, picked off some tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. PRAY IDE SING broke sharp, vied up front between horses, gave way in the turn. COURAGEOUS TIMMY in a bit tight at the break, remained back. MIDNIGHT BAYOU prompted the issue early out in the strip, moved closer in the turn then gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack just off rail, knifed thru btwn foes into lane, strongly

ENTRY.NAME: Gimmeasound
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, held a narrow lead into lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, vied btwn foes, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Genius
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace 3w for a half, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Builder
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back,passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, closer turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Courageous Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight at the break, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: And Fifty
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, closer 4w intro lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Premo
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, moved inside, improved through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Heartthrob Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body outside, 6w into lane, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Gottatakehimto
ENTRY.OWNER: Batiste Lionel Jr and Hebert Brandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 4w into lane, rallied 2nd, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 20, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 20, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs.C laiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARLIE G bumped both sides at the break to be last away, unhurried off the inside, three wide into the lane, late bid, in time. RUSSIAN TANK closest to the dueling leaders after breaking forwardly, chased that pair into the far turn when beginning to close the gap, outside bid, spirited stretch duel, led late, nipped in the final strides while between horses at the wire. TODDCHERO broke on top, keen early when dueling past the wire the first time, continued to alternate up front up the backstretch and into the far turn through some lively fractions, gained a bit larger advantage midway on the final bend before being joined by the runner up from the outside, dueled stretch, proved stubborn to the end. MI SOLUTION away well, dueled up front closest to the inside, steadied slightly along the rail early in the second turn, quickly recovered and also gave ground grudgingly through the stretch. FATHER RED unruly in the gate, broke in, bumped winner, void of speed in trailing early, improved position slightly through the lane with some mild late interest. JUST DEAL WITH IT broke out to also bump the winner, settled off the pace, came up empty for the drive while off the rail. COLOR FAST finished early to fall back to trail. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF MI SOLUTION AGAINST TODDCHERO FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE FAR TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Color Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Just Deal With It
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outk, bumped foe,settled off the pace, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie G
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped both sides brk, back and outside, late bid, up

ENTRY.NAME: Father Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly gate, bmp brk void of speed, mild late interest off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Russian Tank
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel, 3w bid, dueled stretch, led late, nipped

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled inside, slight steady 3/8, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Toddchero
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: keen early, dueled 2p, lively pace, stubbornly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RISING KOTO STAR back off the pace and outside, raced four wide through the turn, chased the two leaders past the furlong marker, late sure to be clear at the end. CAJUN CYCLONE forwardly placed outside, advanced and challenged into the lane, dueled, led, proved no match for the winner late while drawing clear for the second spot. BOLD CARLOS bothered at the start to race back early, asked along midway on the turn, four to five wide exiting the turn, improved position to be clear of the others. OTRA COSA broke well, narrowly showed the way early inside, dueled into turn, second duel upper, caved in late. I NITA WARRIOR back off the pace and the inside, floated out six wide by BOLD CARLOS turning for home, improved position a bit without posing a serious threat. PUPPETEER off a step slow, trailed early, improved inside of several rivals turning for home then flattened out the final furlong. AUTUMN ROB a bit green at the break, void of speed, passed a couple of tiring rivals to improve after the issue had been decided. GEM FRIEND broke in to bother BOLD CARLOS, was straightened to race in the second flight, faded through the stretch. BABY'S LAST DANCE in mid pack for three furlongs, tired in the drive. POUND OUT A DEAL dueled early off the inside, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Otra Cosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pace inside, caved in late

ENTRY.NAME: Baby's Last Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired drive

ENTRY.NAME: Puppeteer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, improved inside, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Pound Out a Deal
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered break, 4-5w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Gem Friend
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bothered foe, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: I Nita Warrior
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Jeffery Sr and Denmark Ryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, floated out 6w into lane, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Autumn Rob
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit green at the break, back,passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Rising Koto Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 4w turn, late surge outside

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, bid, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 76. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 20, 202 3 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 20, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUMINOUS FLIGHT brushed, broke back, moved up inside, tracked the first flight inside, fell back a bit in some traffic turn, tipped out for the drive, firmly roused, closed in game fashion to earn the dead heat on the outside. HUSHED COURT ROOM with the pace from the start off the inside, held a narrow advantage out of the turn and past the furlong marker, held with good determination to earn part of the win. DOLLY'S GUITAR brushed start, last to leave, raced back early inside, moved closer while continuing to save some ground exiting the turn, late bid inside the top two, outkicked by that pair late. TWO JET back off the pace and the inside, three to four wide when roused turning for home,slow gain while widest of the first flight at the wire. CAJUN CATALINA vied up front along the inside, continued to battle into the lane closest to the rail, weakened the final furlong to lose several positions. BUILDING HOME lacked speed, raced three wide into the stretch, improved slightly. DEBBIES PASSAGE forwardly placed early while widest, four to six wide through the turn, lacked a closing kick. SHESABEAUTYDANCER prompted the issue early, tired while five wide out of the turn. A RUNNIN AFLEET trailed throughout out to be no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Dolly's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush,last away, lacked speed, closer inside, late bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Luminous Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush, brk back, tracked inside, traffic turn, tipped out, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: A Runnin Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to be no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Catalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front inside, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Hushed Court Room
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace off rail, long drive, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Two Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, 3-4w into lane, slowly gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Shesabeautydancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Deckert Mark and Terre Dawn W
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, tired while 5w out of the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Building Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 3w into lane, improved a bit

ENTRY.NAME: Debbies Passage
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, 4-6w turn, no kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARMING KAT in the second flight inside, shuffled back early in the turn, steered out three wide when being asked turning for home, challenged nearing the furlong marker, drifted in to bother GYPSY JACKPOT soon after then edged clear late under steady handling. MS. PRIESTLY closest to the leader off the inside, continued to chase through the turn and into the lane, lodged a mild bid a furlong out, could not match the winner late. HIGHER NOTE lacked speed off rail, in traffic and four wide into the lane, finished willingly when clear. GYPSY JACKPOT in the second flight outside, three wide through the turn, closer inside CHARMING KAT into the lane, bothered by that drifting rival past the furlong marker, regathered, nipped late for the third spot. SUM CHARM broke alertly, cleared to the inside, set the pace until just less than a furlong remained and faltered when headed. HALOS ALARM void of speed, continued to lag through the turn, improved upper stretch then flattened out the final furlong. ZONG WAVE in mid pack, saved some ground into the lane, lacked a closing rally. SUNSET FLASH lacked speed outside, five wide exiting the turn, also lacked a closing response. MEAN DREAMER in mid pack for a half, backed up through the lane. OAK HILL STRONG last away, trailed, appeared to go wrong then fell exiting the turn unseating her rider. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY AND A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF GYPSY JACKPOT AGAINST CHARMING CAT FOR INTERFERENCE IN MIDSTRETCH, THE LATTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST AND PLACED FOURTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Halos Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: devoid of speed, trailed, improved into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, fell into lane, unseated rider

ENTRY.NAME: Zong Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack toward rail, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w, traffic 1/4, willingly late

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Charming Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, shuffled 7/16, steered out 3w, bid, drift 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, backed up through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Priestly
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, chased into lane, mild bid 1/8, not enuf

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 3w, bit, bothered 1/8, nipped show

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared to the inside, ,pace, faltered late
